## ModifierInformation interface

The modifier keys currently active

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ModifierInformation 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [altKey](./test-keyboard.modifierinformation.altkey.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the <code>Alt</code> key is active |
|  [ctrlKey](./test-keyboard.modifierinformation.ctrlkey.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the <code>Control</code> key is active |
|  [metaKey](./test-keyboard.modifierinformation.metakey.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the <code>Meta</code> key is active |
|  [shiftKey](./test-keyboard.modifierinformation.shiftkey.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the <code>Shift</code> key is active |
